result.execSummary:
One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Sarah L Mastaglio is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgment of dismissal/acquittal

10:17 AM Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Tanck-Adams in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Sarah L Mastaglio in court, in custody.  Attorney Juan Sebastian Ramirez and Michael Forella in court for Sarah L Mastaglio. Court Reporter Sara Rogan. Parties are prepared to proceed with plea/sentencing today. 

State puts offer on the record. Defense confirms offer. 

Plea questionnaire filed. Court holds plea colloquy with defendant. 

Plea - 21CF08 Cts 2, 3 & 4- NO CONTEST. 
22CF434 Cts 1, 2 & 3- NO CONTEST. 
Factual basis found in complaint. 
BTC: 21CF08 Cts 2, 3 & 4 GUILTY with Ct 1 being dismissed and read in. 22CF434 Cts 1, 2 & 3 GUILTY with remaining counts dismissed and read in. 22CF278 will be dismissed and read in. 
Parties give arguments as to sentencing. 

BTC: 
21CF08-
Ct 2-
2 years Wisconsin State Prison bifurcated 1 year initial confinement with 1 year extended supervision imposed and stayed on each count to run concurrent if revoked.  
2 years probation.

Conditions of probation:
120 days STAYED. 
No alcohol or controlled substances unless prescribed by a physician, to be
monitored accordingly.
Any assessments/counseling/treatment deemed appropriate by agent.
Obtain/maintain full-time employment and or schooling as may be feasible with social security. 
No contact with the victim.
No contact with any known drug dealers or users. 
Firearm warning.
Voting warning.
Deft is Ordered to provide a DNA specimen;
Court Costs+ DNA Surcharge

Defendant is eligible for CIP
Defendant is eligible for SAP. 

22CF434- Time served sentence. 
Firearm warning. Voting warning.
Deft is Ordered to provide a DNA specimen;
Mandatory Court Costs+ DNA Surcharge, payment plan $25/month commending 10/1/2022.

BTC: BOND MODIFICATION: Denied.

BTC: Motion to dismiss counts 3,4,5,6 granted, counts dismissed w/o prejudice. 
BTC: Reading of amended complaint is waived, probable cause found on counts 1 and 2, bond set.
